My First F-Droid Archive Demo

The repository of older versions of applications from the main demo repository.

Currently it serves 1 apps. To add it to your F-Droid client, scan the QR code (click it to enlarge) or use this URL:

https://f-droid.org/archive

If you would like to manually verify the fingerprint (SHA-256) of the repository signing key, here it is:
F6 91 02 27 B3 A8 29 4F 9F 07 39 D9 FC 1A 6A 2E B2 7A 04 12 76 DD 0A 1C A5 31 31 8D 68 0B 69 15
